routes.name: Early H. sapiens mosaic across Africa

routes.name: Into Southeast Asia

routes.name: East Asia

routes.name: Across Siberia

routes.name: Beringia occupation
routes.description: Populations persisted in Beringia during glacial phases.

routes.description: Eastern stream through the Great Lakes region.

routes.description: Southern sweep reaching modern South Africa by the 1st–2nd millennium CE.

routes.name: Austronesian: Taiwan → Philippines

routes.name: Austronesian: Philippines → Island SE Asia

routes.name: Madagascar (Austronesian + Bantu)

routes.name: Steppe‑related ancestry → South Asia

routes.description: One of the largest refugee corridors of the 2010s.
